----
Analyze the new landscape of Google's search results by examining the URLs cited in the AI Overview section. This extension allows you to compare these AI Overview resources with traditional SERP results, providing insightful data for SEOs.

Features:

Compare AI Overview and Traditional SERP: View and compare cited resources in a table with traditional SERP results. 

Download the data in a spreadsheet with a single click.

Domain Presence Summary: See domain presence on AI Overview as a doughnut chart, showing which domains have what share of the cited resources.

Easy Copy and Paste: Copy tables to a spreadsheet with a simple copy button.

Dynamic SERP Table: The traditional SERP table updates with more results as you scroll, including "People also asked" sections.

Note:
This extension relies on the current structure of Google's SERP source code. If Google makes changes to their code, the extension might stop working. Please inform me of any issues, and I will update the plugin promptly.

Limitations:

The extension works only on the simple format of AI Overview with explanations and cited links. It doesn't support shopping items or other non-link content in the AI Overview.
